import React from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../assets/velikonocni-cupcaky.jpg' import star_icon_dull from '../assets/velikonocni-cupcaky.jpg' import { useContext } from 'react' import { ShopContext } from '../../context/ShopContext' const RecipeDisplay = (props) => { const {recipe}=props; if(!recipe){ return(

Loading...

) } return (
{all_recipes.map((item, i)=>{ return })}
) /*

{recipe.name}

(122)

Category: {recipe.category}

{recipe.preparation_time} min
Počet porcí: {recipe.servings}
*/ } export default RecipeDisplay
